entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a Divination teacher who is being bullied by Umbridge. She is described as 'increasingly hysterical' and is muttering to herself in the corridors.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a Care of Magical Creatures teacher who may be next to be sacked by Umbridge.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who is bullying Professor Trelawney and Hagrid. She is described as lurking in the tower room with a clipboard.

relationships.description: Umbridge is bullying Professor Trelawney by interrupting her lessons and demanding that she demonstrate her skills.
Umbridge may also be next to bully Hagrid, as she is trying to sack him from his job.
